tool_description: Calculates estimated costs and budget allocations for procurement projects based on requirements and market analysis.

estimated_total_value.description: Initial estimated total project value in dollars

cost_categories.description: List of cost categories (e.g., personnel, equipment, services)

contingency_percentage.description: Contingency buffer as percentage of total (0-20)

inflation_rate.description: Annual inflation rate for multi-year projects (0-10)

error_messages: Invalid requirements reference: Provide a valid requirements_id.
Negative values not allowed: All monetary amounts and durations must be positive.
Excessive contingency: Contingency percentage must be between 0-20%.
Invalid inflation rate: Inflation rate must be between 0-10%.
usage: Provide requirements ID, project duration, estimated value, and cost categories. Optionally adjust contingency percentage and inflation rate. Returns detailed budget breakdown and recommendations.
